title: Mobile air curtain burner for use in forestry
summary: A harvesting head able to fell and cut trees of at least 200mm in diameter

eligible.eligibleBullet01: be a be mobile air curtain burner for use in forestry
eligible.eligibleBullet02: have a a capacity of at least 15m3
eligible.eligibleBullet05: have a high velocity airflow over the top of the burning chamber
eligible.eligibleText01: Items that use fossil fuel in the combustion process are not eligible.
eligible.eligibleText02: This item is only available to forestry owners and forestry contractors.
